ai-kv21.8:5.1_0: There is a new dispensation of the Realized One’s instructions. All of them, there are disciples of the Realized Ones, Lords, Paccekabuddhas, and who haven’t given up all fetters, and who are rightly freed through enlightenment, and who has not given up all fetters. All these things, whether or not one who is awakened or not.
